sentences.en: a dish of freshly picked peas
sentences.cn: 一盘新摘的豌豆

sentences.en: A good dose of tonic will help you to pick up.
sentences.cn: 一剂好的补品将有助于身体康复。

sentences.en: a shopper who picked over the grapes before purchasing them.
sentences.cn: 一个买葡萄时精挑细选的顾客

sentences.en: Amy picked a small bunch of wild flowers.
sentences.cn: 埃米采了一小把野花。

sentences.en: Any decent shot with telescopic sights could pick us off at random.
sentences.cn: 任何借助望远镜瞄准器的像样射手都可以随意把我们逐个干掉。

sentences.en: Don't pick at me day and night.
sentences.cn: 别整天对我唠叨挑三拣四

sentences.en: Have a look at the menu and take your pick .
sentences.cn: 看看菜单再作选择吧。

sentences.en: He knew he could take his pick of any of the girls in the office.
sentences.cn: 他知道自己可以挑办公室里任何一个姑娘。

sentences.en: He stooped to pick up the carrier bag of groceries.
sentences.cn: 他俯下身去提装着食品杂货的购物袋。

sentences.en: He was trying to pick up some cash scalping tickets.
sentences.cn: 他那时正想通过倒票赚点儿钱。

sentences.en: I don’t know which colour to pick.
sentences.cn: 我不知道要选哪个颜色。

sentences.en: I vote that you try to pick out the trail for us.
sentences.cn: 我提议由你来选我们该走哪条小路。

sentences.en: I'll pick up on what I said a couple of minutes ago.
sentences.cn: 我将回到几分钟前我说过的内容。

sentences.en: Let me pick up the tab.
sentences.cn: 我来付计程车的钱

sentences.en: Let's pick up the discussion after lunch.
sentences.cn: 我们吃过午饭再继续讨论吧

sentences.en: Let's pick up the living room.
sentences.cn: 我们收拾一下卧室吧

sentences.en: Listeners have been invited to phone in to pick the winner.
sentences.cn: 听众被邀请打进电话选择赢家。

sentences.en: Pick over the fruit and pile on top of the cream.
sentences.cn: 拣出好的水果，码放在奶油上。

sentences.en: pick up a book.
sentences.cn: 捡起一本书

sentences.en: picked out the best piece of silk.
sentences.cn: 挑出最好的一匹丝绸

sentences.en: picked out their cousins from the crowd.
sentences.cn: 从人群中认出他们的堂兄弟

sentences.en: picked up a mink coat on sale.
sentences.cn: 拍卖时随手买了一件貂皮大衣

sentences.en: picked up a virus in the office.
sentences.cn: 在办公室染上病毒

sentences.en: picked up five yards on that play.
sentences.cn: 在那次游戏中获得五码

sentences.en: picked up French very quickly.
sentences.cn: 很快地学起法语来

sentences.en: picked up her shoes at the repair shop.
sentences.cn: 在修鞋铺领回鞋子

sentences.en: picked up some beverages on the way home.
sentences.cn: 在回家的路上买些饮料

sentences.en: picked up the broken pieces of glass.
sentences.cn: 拾起玻璃碎片

sentences.en: Russell spoke slowly, picking his words (= choosing what to say ) very carefully.
sentences.cn: 罗素讲得很慢，措辞谨慎。

sentences.en: Sales picked up last fall.
sentences.cn: 去年的销售有起色

sentences.en: Sarah could have her pick of any university in the country.
sentences.cn: 萨拉可以选择国内任何一所大学。

sentences.en: See our selection of autumn favourites and take your pick.
sentences.cn: 看看我们的秋季精选，然后挑出你想要的。

sentences.en: She dug the foundation with a pick and shovel.
sentences.cn: 她用镐和平锹挖地基。

sentences.en: She just picked up and left.
sentences.cn: 她收拾了一下行李就走了

sentences.en: She would cleverly pick up on what I said.
sentences.cn: 她会非常聪慧地领悟我所说的话。

sentences.en: Students have to pick three courses from a list of 15.
sentences.cn: 学生必须从15门课中选修3门。

sentences.en: The bus picks up commuters at three stops.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车在三个站载送通勤者

sentences.en: The child just picked at her food.
sentences.cn: 这孩子只吃她了一点食物

sentences.en: The coast guard picked up five smugglers.
sentences.cn: 海岸检查官拘捕了五个走私犯

sentences.en: The dog picked up the scent.
sentences.cn: 狗追着气味走

sentences.en: The hunter picked the ducks off one by one.
sentences.cn: 猎人把鸭子一个个击中

sentences.en: The lawyer picked the testimony apart.
sentences.cn: 律师挑证词的毛病

sentences.en: The Roman Swiss Army knife has a knife, spoon, fork, spike, spatula, and small pick.
sentences.cn: 这种古罗马瑞士军刀包含了刀，勺，叉，长钉，抹刀和小鹤嘴锄。

sentences.en: They had come to the world's most famous pick-up joint.
sentences.cn: 他们来到了全世界最有名的寻花问柳之地。

sentences.en: Trains will operate from Waterloo with a pick-up stop at Ashford.
sentences.cn: 火车从滑铁卢站出发，途中会在阿什福德站停靠上人。

sentences.en: We had the pick of suits from the shop.
sentences.cn: 我们买了店里最好的套装。

sentences.en: We picked some blackberries to eat on the way.
sentences.cn: 途中我们采了一些黑莓吃。

sentences.en: We picked up two submarines on sonar.
sentences.cn: 我们用声波定位仪观察到两条潜水艇

sentences.en: We, the patients, cannot pick and choose our doctors.
sentences.cn: 我们患者不能对医生挑挑拣拣。

sentences.en: Who’s going to pick the team for the match on Saturday?
sentences.cn: 谁将为星期六的比赛挑选队员？

words.tran_cn: 采摘者；采摘机；啄者；挖掘者
采摘；掘，撬开；采得物；赃物

phrases.tran_cn: 对某人不满；与某人起争端
[体]掩护转身切入；挡切战术；掩护走位
挑剔，找毛病：反驳或通过仔细的检查找出错误
&I{【体育运动】} 中途截球：拦截，如拦截足球传球等
分辨：从环境中辩认出；分辨出
一件一件地整理或检查
(非正式)套问别人的信息；向某人请教
把…驳得体无完肤； 对…吹毛求疵；严厉批评
[用以加强语气，尤指人群关系]谨慎选择
&I{【俚语】} 收拾行李：收拾某人的东西

trans.tran_cn: 挑选，选中的人/事物，精华，镐，拨片
trans.tran_en: if you can have your pick or take your pick of different things, you can choose which one you want
to remove a flower, fruit, nut etc from a plant or tree
to choose a person or thing, for example because they are the best or most suitable
to choose a person or thing, for example because they are the best or most suitable
